q: ''Egypt recognises and appreciates the care and effort undertaken by the government of Germany to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti,'' Zahi Hawass said in a statement. But he asked that this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people. FILE- In this March 7, 1982 file photo, Cleopatra's... Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., on Dec. 10 decrying proposed tax cuts is being published by Nation Books as The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class, Sen. Bernie Sanders announced Wednesday. The book is to become available in mid-February, while an e-book edition will be available Jan. 28, Nation Books said in a news release. The new organization is expected to streamline things by elevating me and having Larry running things day to day, Mr. Eric Schmidt said. Meanwhile Google co-founder Sergey Brin ( right) will change his role to spend more hands-on time developing new products.
